name: Soup Rush
description:
YOU WAITER! - Overview

HEY! FAST! The clients are ordering food and you are the only one working here!
Move with WASD or ZQSD and go to the table and press E to start cooking!
Use the mouse to grab ingredients and mix them together in the pot, then cook it in the stove!
Now grab the food with E, run and give the client the food they wanted to get paid, if you give them an incorrect order or make them wait too much you will have to pay them as a compensation! 

And remember, THE LESS TIME YOU MAKE THEM WAIT, THE MORE THEY WILL PAY YOU!

There are limited tables, and clients will only be able to enter if there is a spot for them, so the less clients you have the more space for new ones and therefore more potential clients in less time!

You will have to work here for an entire week from 17:00 to 22:00, I hope you don't get any nightmares after this... hehe!

There is no time for more explanations, just go and start cooking to get your daily revenue goal, if you reach it the restaurant will keep growing and having more space and decorations!

WHAT ARE YOU STILL DOING HERE?! 3 ORDERS OF GREENTACLE SOUP FOR THE TABLE 3!

SOUPER FAST FOOD - The restaurant that waits for no one

The residents of the planet Plungustu "the plungustians" don't have normal bodies. Unlike us, they have jelly-like slug bodies an they doesn't take solid food very well, and for this reason the soup is really popular there, and you are the only employee of the new branch of the SOUPER FAST FOOD restaurant chain. As the manager, waiter, chef and every other position you could imagine you have entire responsibility of everything that happens here, and because of this if you fail only 1 day you will lose your job, so don't even think about slacking off!

OTHER INFO

This game was made for the BlackThornProd GameJam #3

All the art, sounds, music and programming was made during the jam.

CREDITS

Main Programming and Level Design by PauloWgg

Art, Music and Sound Design by SoyVixter

Help with Ideas and moral support by TorontoRaptor76
